text: Hello guys, I need your help, I have a form with a file field and I need to get file public url, immediately after submitting (using onFormSubmitted event), any idea? Thank you

you can’t get the file url until after the file has been submitted and would need the API to do so.

If you’re just trying to display an image however that the user submitted there’s actually some ways you can do it, that don’t require using the API

here: <https://codepen.io/mobifreaks/pen/LIbca>

Basically you can grab it as a data url and use it however you want
so on form submit you’d just do what is being done in this pen to grab the image and display it as a data uri
Thanks for your answer <@U7SL518D6>, but I need the url, so that user can use it later from another application

unfortunately I think you’re going to have to use the API to get that, you may also have an issue with how long it takes for the record to get added to HubSpot.

There’s a delay between submitting a form and that data being available to query against.
I understand you, I will talk with my client,  thank you very much,
